title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard for nested classes, the wizard does not correctly determine the context.
EB: When using build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor, clicking the new class button and checking the 'Enclosing Type' field, it is observed that the field is blank. It is expected that the 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor.
SR: Ensure that the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard defaults to the current type in the editor when creating a nested class.
